#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
    char a[100];
    while(cin.getline(a,100)) {
                              for(int i = 0;a[i] != '\0';i++) {
                                      if(a[i] == '/' && a[i+1] == '/') break;
                                      if(a[i] == '-' && a[i+1] == '>') {
                                              a[i] = '@';
                                              a[i+1] = '@';
                                      }
                              }
                              for(int i = 0;a[i] != '\0';i++) {
                                      if(a[i] == a[i+1] && a[i] == '@') {
                                              cout << ".";
                                              i++;
                                              continue;
                                      }
                                      cout << a[i];
                              }
                              cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
